comments.p: NOTE: Earn six credit hours, but attend class only one night per week for three hours. For advisement, call the faculty members: Mary Lou Avera, 972-860-4179, marylou@dcccd.edu; or Marisa Walsdorf, 972-860-4186, marisa_walsdorf@dcccd.edu. Minimum requirements for enrollment: A student must be currently employed in an appropriate job and meet the TSI requirements in reading and writing. Credits are earned in a traditional on-campus course and in an on-the-job, cooperative education training course. There are no course prerequisites, but students may enroll in only one co-op ed course per semester. It is strongly recommended that interested students contact a faculty member before classes begin. Visit us online at www.BrookhavenCollege.edu then click on "M" for Management in the A-Z index.
